alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SWEET GRASS AND CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Bozeman, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail as well as torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Pine Creek, and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley
